item.description:
Agenda (proposed)

Meet at McDonald's at 8:15 leave at 8:30.

Go out Marshall St through Leicester, Paxton etc.

Second meeting place could be Dunkin Donuts in Rutland Center at 9 AM +-.

From there go west up Rt 122 the some roads thru the country to a brunch place in Sunderland.

Then around Quabbin, or north then east.

Suggestions welcome. Just remember, I don't know anyones ability, so let's keep it somewhat easy.
item.how_to_find_us: Lets meet at McDonald's on Mill St., Worcester, just before Chandler Street. This is near Tatnuck Square. There is a parking area in the back. Meet at 8:15 to leave at about 8:30. i have blue Yamaha.
item.name: Motorcycle ride
